Uses of Package
ca.krasnay.sqlbuilder

Packages that use ca.krasnay.sqlbuilder
ca.krasnay.sqlbuilder   
ca.krasnay.sqlbuilder.orm   
 

Classes in ca.krasnay.sqlbuilder used by ca.krasnay.sqlbuilder
AbstractSqlBuilder
          Abstract base class for builders.
AbstractSqlCreator
          Abstract base class of SQL creator classes.
DeleteBuilder
          Builder for creating SQL delete statements.
DeleteCreator
          A Spring PreparedStatementCreator that you can use like a DeleteBuilder.
Dialect
          Interface representing a SQL dialect.
ExistsPredicate
          Predicate used to add an EXISTS clause to the where clause.
InsertBuilder
          Builder for building SQL insert statements.
InsertCreator
          A Spring PreparedStatementCreator that you can use like an InsertBuilder.
ParameterizedPreparedStatementCreator
          Implementation of Spring's PreparedStatementCreator that allows for the substitution of named parameters.
Predicate
          Component in the where clause of a SelectCreator, UpdateCreator, or DeleteCreator.
SelectBuilder
          Tool for programmatically constructing SQL select statements.
SelectCreator
          A Spring PreparedStatementCreator that you can use like a SelectBuilder.
SubSelectBuilder
          SelectBuilder that can be used as a sub-select in a column expression or FROM clause.
SubSelectCreator
          Creator for part of a SQL sub-select statement used as a column expression or a FROM clause.
UnionSelectCreator
          Creator for part of a SQL select statement that comes after the UNION keyword.
UpdateBuilder
          Builder for creating SQL update statements.
UpdateCreator
          A Spring PreparedStatementCreator that you can use like an UpdateBuilder.
 

Classes in ca.krasnay.sqlbuilder used by ca.krasnay.sqlbuilder.orm
Predicate
          Component in the where clause of a SelectCreator, UpdateCreator, or DeleteCreator.
